column4: that is really mean.  To even jokingly suggest that someone install XP just makes me shudder.
not like I want to debate this (I don't) but there is hardly anything evil in XP that is not in 2000.
DRM and activation are hardly nothing.  And XP is so ugly.  But, you are right that we should not spend more time on it.  Take the last word, as you wish.  I'll say no more.
